pip.translation[0].definitions[0].defini: a small seed from a fruit such as an apple or orange
pip.translation[0].definitions[0].exampl: Have these oranges got pips in?

pip.translation[0].definitions[2].defini: one of the stars on the shoulders of the coats of army officers that shows their rank
pip.translation[1].definitions[0].defini: to beat someone in a race, competition etc, by only a small amount
pip.translation[1].definitions[0].exampl: Jackson just pipped him for the gold.
